data.message: Thank you for all you've done. You made it possible for me to reconnect with half of my family after years apart.

replies.message: We're so happy to hear that, Jennifer! Thanks for sharing and being a part of what makes the Facebook community so special! -Lauren

Dear Facebook, in 2009 when the EXPO DESIGN CENTER (39stores) closed, Brian Solomon established a Facebook account for us and for the past six years we have been able to keep in touch with each other, no matter what state we're in...once again THANKS BRIAN 😍 & FACEBOOK, we're proud too be parts of your 1,000,000,000💖💖💖💖
since last month i join n facebook and now i have comunecate my friends and relatabe thanks to facebook
